attributes.action: force manufacturers and retailers to use "traffic light labelling" as per the FSA
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The object of this petition is to protect public health in the simplest way possible, by using the traffic light labelling system.  Details at: http://www.food.gov.uk/foodlabelling/  In practice if a product is on the boundary of red and orange, then manufacturers reduce the “bad” content to get an orange colour - saving the nations health.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
